entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your veryfirst post. Check documentation formore info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find theanswer in troubleshooting oryou can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

More info: Writing

Run server

More info: Server

Generate static files

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

More info: Deployment

entry.title: New artical
entry.content:
这部分是正文的摘要。经过测试，如果首页的文章列表中没有略缩图和摘要，标题+文章信息的显示方式会使页面过于拥挤，所以给出此项配置供喜欢首页只显示文章标题的同学使用。

1. (Warming Up)

1.1

For the following graph \(G\)

[[COMP9020 Week 5 Problem Set 2023-03-2114.48.30.excalidraw|200]]

  • give all simple paths of length 3 starting in \(b\) and ending in \(c\); 给出从 \(b\) 开始、以 \(c\) 结束的长度为 3 的所有简单路径；
    • {b, e} -> {d, e} -> {e, c}
    • {b, e} -> {e, d} -> {d, c}
  • give the vertex sequence of two different paths between \(b\) and \(c\) of length 3 that are not simple;给出长度为 3 的两条不同路径的顶点序列，它们之间不是简单路径；
    • {b, a, b, c}
    • {b, d, e, b}
    • {c, d, e, b}
    • {b, c, d, b}
  • give a cycle of length 4; 给出长度为 4 的环；
    • {a, b} -> {b, d} -> {d, c} -> {c, a}
    • ....
  • give the degree sequence of graph; 给出图的度序列；
    • 0, 0, 1, 2, 2. degree 0 1 2 3 4 sequence 0 0 1 2 2
    • No vertex has degree 0 or 1. Vertex a is of degree 2. Vertices d ande are of degree 3 while vertices b and c have degree 4. 0, 0, 1, 2, 2.没有顶点的度数为0或1。顶点a的度数为2。顶点d和e的度数为3，而顶点b和c的度数为4。
  • verify that \(\sum_{v\in{V (G)}}deg(v)=2\cdot|E(G)|\) holds (cf. slide 6, week 5). 验证 \(\sum_{v\in{V (G)}}deg (v)=2\cdot|E(G)|\)是否成立 (参见第 5 周幻灯片第 6 页)
    • The graph has one vertex of degree 2, two vertices of degree 3 andtwo vertices of degree 4. Hence, \(\sum_{v\inV(G)} \mbox{deg}(v)=1\cdot 2+2\cdot 3+2\cdot 4=16\). This istwice the number of edges, \(|E(G)|=8\).这个图有一个度为2的顶点，两个度为3的顶点和两个度为4的顶点。因此，\(\sum_{v\in V(G)} \mbox{deg}(v)=1\cdot 2+2\cdot3+2\cdot 4=16\)。这是边的数量的两倍，即\(|E(G)|=8\)。

1.2

  • Is the above graph G planar? 上述图 G 是否为可平面图？
    • The graph is planar: Redraw one of the edges {b,e}or {c,d} such that it does not intersect with any ofthe other edges.这个图是可平面的：重新绘制{b,e}或{c,d}中的一条边，使其不与任何其他边相交。

1.3

  • Draw a complete bipartite K2,2 graph. Find bothan Euler circuit and a Hamiltonianpath in your graph and determine their respectivelength. 画出一个完全二分图 \(K_{2,2}\)。在你的图中找到一条欧拉回路和一条哈密顿路径，并确定它们各自的长度。
    • [[COMP9020 Week 5 Problem Set 2023-03-2323.08.20.excalidraw|200]]
    • Euler circuit: {a, c} -> {c, b} -> {b, d}-> {d, a}
    • Hamiltonian path: {a, c} -> {c, b} -> {b,d}

1.4

  • What is the chromatic number \(\chi\) of your graph for Exercise 1.3? Andwhat is its clique number \(\kappa\)?对于问题 1.3 的图，它的色数 \(\chi\)是多少？它的团数 \(\kappa\) 是多少？
    • \(\chi{(K_{2,2})}=2\)
    • \(\kappa{(K_{2,2})}=2\)
    • Two colours are both necessary and sufficient. There are cliques ofsize 2 (each edge is one such clique) but no "triangles", i.e.,3-cliques.

2. （Graph properties）

  • The complete bipartite graph \(K_{5,5}\) has no cycle of length five完全二分图 K 5,5 没有长度为 5 的圈
    • \(K_{5,5}\) [[COMP9020 Week 5Problem Set 2023-03-21 14.56.05.excalidraw]]
    • True. In general, bipartite graphs can only havecycles of even length. If \(V_{1},V_{2}\) denote the two groups ofnodes in the bipartite graph, then every path starting from, say, anode \(v\in{V_{1}}\) must alternate itsvertices between \(V_{1}\) and \(V2\). If it is a cycle (that is, eventuallyreturns to node \(v\)), it must have aneven number of such alternations, in other words, it contains an evennumber of edges.正确。通常来说，二分图只能有偶数长度的循环。如果\(V_{1},V_{2}\)表示二分图中的两个节点组，则从一个节点\(v\in{V_{1}}\)开始的每条路径必须在\(V_{1}\)和\(V_{2}\)之间交替其顶点。如果它是一个循环（即最终返回到节点\(v\)），它必须有偶数个这样的交替，换句话说，它包含偶数条边。
  • If you add a new edge to a cycle \(C_{5}\), the resulting graph will alwayscontain a 3-clique. 如果你向长度为 \(C_5\)的环中添加一条新的边，那么得到的图形总是包含一个3-团
    • True. The two newly connected vertices will alwaysform a 3-clique with one of the other vertices.正确。两个新连接的顶点将始终与其他一个顶点形成一个3-团。
  • If you remove two edges from \(K_{5}\), the resulting graph will alwayshave a clique number of 4. 如果从 \(K_{5}\) 中移除两条边，则所得到的图始终具有4 个团。
    • False. Remove any two edges which have no commonvertex. In the resulting graph there will be no four fullyinterconnected vertices; in other words it will not containK4, and will have a clique number of 3.错误。移除任何两条没有公共顶点的边。在得到的图中，不会有四个完全互连的顶点；换句话说，它不包含_K_4，其团数为3。
  • If you remove three edges from graph \(G\) in Exercise 1.1, the resulting graphwill always be acyclic or disconnected. 如果从问题 1.1 的图 \(G\)中移除三条边，则所得到的图始终是无环的或者不连通的。
    • False. The resulting graph does not satisfy \(|V|=|E|+1\), hence if it is connected thenit cannot be a tree and therefore must contain a cycle.错误。由于\(|V|=|E|+1\)，因此得到的图不满足此条件。因此，如果该图是连通的，则不能是一棵树，因此必须包含一个循环。
  • There is a graph with degree sequence 0, 1, 5, 1. 存在一个度序列为0、1、5、1 的图。
    • True. Take, for example, the graph from the answerto Exercise 6.1.13 (a) on slide9 (week 5) and add a path of length 2 (with 2 new vertices) to oneof the four vertices. 正确。例如，考虑第5周第9页上练习6.1.13（a）的答案所示的图，并向其中的一个四个顶点之一添加长度为2的路径（带有2个新顶点）。
  • There are \(3·3 = 9\) differentautomorphisms of \(K_{3}\). \(K_{3}\) 有 \(3\cdot 3=9\) 种不同的自同构。

3. (Graph traversal)

For each of the following graphs, show a Hamiltonian path or arguewhy no such path exists.对于以下每个图形，展示一个哈密顿路径，或说明为什么不存在这样的路径。

  • A connected graph with degree sequence 0,2,2,2 and clique number 3.度序列为 0,2,2,2 且团数为 3 的连通图。
    • [[COMP9020 Week 5 Problem Set 2023-03-2323.38.06.excalidraw|200]]
    • Hamiltonian path: {a, b} -> {b, c} -> {c, d} -> {d, e}-> {e, f}
  • \(K_{4,3}\)
    • [[COMP9020 Week 5 Problem Set 2023-03-2323.42.08.excalidraw|300]]
    • Hamiltonian path: {v1, u1} -> {u1, v2} -> {v2, u2} -> {u2,v3} -> {v3, u3} -> {u3, v4}
  • \(K_{1,4,1}\)
    • False. Even if you start with one of the 4 verticesin the largest partition, you can visit at most 3 of them before youhave to return to a previously visited vertex from one of the other twopartitions.错误。即使你从最大分区中的一个顶点开始，也可以在必须返回到另外两个分区中的一个之前访问最多4个顶点（即该二分图中的所有顶点）
  • \(K_{4,2,2}\)
    • [[COMP9020 Week 5 Problem Set 2023-03-2400.20.45.excalidraw|300]]
  • All graphs with degree sequence 0, 3, 1, 1.所有度序列为 0,3,1,1 的图。
    • False. The top right tree on slide17 (week 5) is the only graph on 5 nodes that has one vertex ofdegree 3, one vertex of degree 2 plus three vertices of degree 1. Thistree has no Hamiltonian path since you have to go through the top nodeat least twice in order to visit all three nodes of degree 1.错误。第5周第17页上的右上方树是唯一一个具有一个度为3的顶点，一个度为2加上三个度为1的顶点的5个节点图。这棵树没有哈密顿路径，因为你必须至少通过顶部节点两次才能访问所有度为1的三个节点。
  • All graphs with degree sequence 0, 0, 6.所有度序列为 0,0,6 的图。
    • False. A graph consisting of two disconnectedsub-graphs K3 has degree sequence 0,0,6 but does notcontain a Hamiltonian path.错误。由两个不连通的_K_3子图组成的图具有度序列0,0,6，但不包含哈密顿路径。

4. (Graph colouring)

For each of the following graphs G, determine its chromaticnumber \(\chi(G)\). If there aredifferent graphs that satisfy the specification, choose one with thesmallest chromatic number. 对于以下每个图形 \(G\)，确定其色数 \(\chi(G)\)。如果存在满足规定的不同图形，则选择色数最小的图形。

  • The graph on the left-hand side on slide39 (week 5). 第 5周幻灯片第 39 页 左侧的图形。
    • The graph has a cycle of length 5, hence 3 colours are necessary. Itis possible to find such a 3-colouring, so \(\chi(G)=3\).该图有一个长度为5的环，因此需要3种颜色。可以找到这样的3种着色方式，因此\(\chi(G)=3\)。
  • A graph obtained by adding three new edges to \(C_{8}\). 在 \(C_{8}\) 中添加三条新边后的图形
    • \(\chi(C_8)=2\), and you can addthree edges so that the resulting graph still satisfies \(\chi(G)=2\): For example, connect the1st and 4th node in the cycle, the 2ndand 5th node, plus the 3rd and 6thnode. \(\chi(C_8)=2\)，并且您可以添加三条边，使得得到的图仍满足\(\chi(G)=2\)：例如，连接循环中的第1个和第4个节点，第2个和第5个节点，以及第3个和第6个节点。
  • A graph obtained by removing three edges from \(K_{3,3}\) 从 \(K_{3,3}\) 中删除三条边后的图形。
    • The remaining graph will still be bipartite, hence \(\chi(G)=2\).剩下的图仍将是二分图，因此\(\chi(G)=2\)。
  • A graph obtained by removing three edges from \(K_{5}\) 从 \(K_{5}\) 中删除三条边后的图形。
    • \(\chi(K_5)=5\), but if you removetwo edges {v1,w1} and{v2,w2} with no vertex incommon, then vi andwi can be coloured the same, for i =1,2. Hence, 3 colours are sufficient (and necessary). \(\chi(K_5)=5\)，但是如果您删除没有公共顶点的两条边{v1,w1}和{v2,w2}，则可以对_i_=1,2为值的_v_i和_w_i进行相同的着色。因此，3种颜色足够（也是必要的）。

5. (Planar graphs)

  • All graphs whose clique number is 4 are planar. 所有团数为 4的图形都是可平面的。
    • False. For example, K3,3 has aclique number of only 2 but is not planar. You can add more edges toturn K3,3 into a graph whose clique number is 4 (andwhich, of course, remains nonplanar). False.例如，K3,3的团数仅为2，但它不是可平面的。您可以添加更多的边来将_K_3,3转化为团数为4的图（当然，它仍然是不可平面的）。
  • All graphs whose chromatic number is 2 are planar. 所有色数为 2的图形都是可平面的。
    • False. For example, K3,3 has achromatic number of 2 but is not planar. False.例如，K3,3的色数为2，但它不是可平面的。
  • All graphs with 5 nodes and 9 edges are planar. 有 5 个节点和 9条边的图形都是可平面的。
    • True. For the minimal nonplanar graphK3,3 you need 6 nodes, and for the other minimalnonplanar graph K5 you need 10 edges.正确。对于最小的非平面图_K_3,3，你需要6个节点，而对于另一个最小的非平面图_K_5，你需要10条边。
  • You cannot obtain a nonplanar graph by adding 3 edges to a tree.无法通过向树中添加 3 条边获得非可平面图形。
    • True. Every tree satisfies \(|E|=|V|-1\). Adding 3 edges gives you agraph with \(|E|=|V|+2\), but you wouldneed three more edges than vertices for K3,3, andfive more edges than vertices for K5.正确。 每棵树都满足\(|E|=|V|-1\)。添加3条边会得到一个\(|E|=|V|+2\)的图形，但对于_K_3,3，你需要比节点多三条边，对于_K_5，你需要比节点多五条边。
  • You cannot obtain a nonplanar graph by adding 3 edges to a cycle.无法通过向环中添加 3 条边获得非可平面图形。
    • False. You can add 3 edges toC6 (a graph with 6 vertices and 6 edges) in such away that you obtain the nonplanar K3,3 (a graph with6 vertices and 9 edges). 错误。 你可以添加3条边到C6（一个有6个顶点和6条边的图），以便以一种方式得到非平面的K3,3（一个有6个顶点和9条边的图）。
  • You can obtain a planar graph by removing two edges from \(K_{6}\) 可以通过从 \(K_{6}\) 中删除两条边来获得可平面图形。
    • False. The remaining graph will always containK3,3, which is nonplanar. 错误。剩下的图形总会包含非平面图 K3,3。

6. (Constructing graphs)

A graph \(G\) is a 2-3 tree if:一个图 \(G\) 是一个 2-3 树，如果:

  • \(G\) is a rooted tree. \(G\) 是一棵根树。
  • Each node has either 2 or 3 children (unless it is a leafnode, which has no children). 每个节点要么有 2 个子节点，要么有 3个子节点（除非它是一个叶子节点，没有子节点）。
  • All paths from the root to the leaves have the same length.从根到叶子节点的所有路径长度相同。 There are seven different types of2-3 trees of height 2 (i.e., which are non-isomorphic). Draw one tree ofeach type. 共有七种高度为 2 的不同类型的 2-3树（即非同构的）。画出每种类型的一棵树。

[!note] Exercise 6

[[COMP9020 Week 5 Problem Set 2023-03-24 00.43.37.excalidraw]]

7. Challenge Exercise

7.1

What is the minimum number of edges that need to be removedfrom \(K_{5}\) so that the resultinggraph has a chromatic number of 从 \(K_{5}\)中最少需要删除多少条边，使得结果图的色数为

  • 3 ?
    • 2 edges. To achieve \(\chi=3\), oneneeds (at least) to avoid having any 4-cliques. Removing one edge leavesa 4-clique (actually two such cliques — including any one but not bothof that edge's endpoints, plus the remaining three vertices). Removingtwo edges suffices — remove any pair of edges which do not share acommon vertex; the remaining graph can then be coloured with 3 colours.2条边。为了实现 \(\chi=3\)，至少需要避免有任何4-团。去掉一条边会留下一个4-团（实际上是两个这样的团——包括其中任何一个但不是两个端点，以及剩余的三个顶点）。去掉两条边足够了——去掉任意一对不共享公共顶点的边；剩下的图可以用3 种颜色涂色。
  • 2 ?
    • 4 edges. A chromatic number of 2 means that the graph is bipartite,with two groups of nodes where each group can be painted with onecolour. To minimise the number of removed edges, we want tohave as many edges as possible in the remaining bipartite graph. Wetherefore look at complete bipartite graphs with a total of 5vertices. As K1,4 has four edges andK2,3 has six edges, the latter is the better choice.To reach it we need to remove 4 of the edges in K5.4条边。色数为 2意味着该图是二分图，有两组节点，其中每组可以用一种颜色涂色。为了使剩下的边数最少，我们希望剩余的二分图中有尽可能多的边。因此，我们看看总共有5 个顶点的完全二分图。由于 \(K_{1,4}\)有四条边而 \(K_{2,3}\)有六条边，后者是更好的选择。要达到它，我们需要去掉 \(K_5\) 中的 4 条边。
  • 1 ?
    • 10 edges. A chromatic number of 1 means a fully disconnected graph,with no edges at all. Therefore all 10 edges of the original graph mustbe removed. 10条边。色数为 1意味着完全断开的图，根本没有边。因此，原始图的所有 10条边都必须被去掉。

7.2

Give a planar drawing of \(K_{2,2,2}\). Can you find one with onlystraight lines? 给出 \(K_{2,2,2}\)的一个平面图形。你能找到一种只用直线的图形吗？

[!note] Exercise 7.2

[[COMP9020 Week 5 Problem Set 2023-03-2400.54.01.excalidraw|300]]

entry.title: 文章样例
entry.content:
这部分是正文的摘要。

标题一

标题二

标题三

标题四

标题五
标题六

这里是正文

分割线

标签页

便签

这里是便签success

这里是便签secondary

这里是便签primary

这里是便签danger

这里是便签warning

这里是便签info

这里是便签light

行内标签

这是一个行内标签text

代码块

LaTeX 数学公式

行内公式

这是一个行内公式 \(a=b+c\)

行间公式

\[E=mc^2\]

勾选框

这是勾选框
普通示例
默认选中
内联示例

后面文字不换行

也可以只传入一个参数，文字写在后边（这样不支持外联）

按钮
